job_description:
Overview:

Puro.earth, a pioneering carbon removal crediting program, is on the lookout for an experienced and dynamic Senior Marketing Manager. With our core focus on scaling carbon removal for maximum climate impact, we're searching for a senior marketer who will play a crucial role in executing marketing and brand strategies that align with our business objectives as defined by the Head of Marketing and PR and the Chief Growth Officer. If you have a positive can-do attitude, are excited by driving growth through marketing campaigns, and have a background in B2B marketing, preferably in the sustainability space, this is your opportunity to join an exciting start-up, backed by Nasdaq, in its growth stage, leading the race for high-quality carbon removal.

Contract: 8-month contract with the opportunity to become permanent

Location: 100% remote based within the US (East Coast time zone) or UK

Reports to: Head of Marketing & PR

Tasks & Responsibilities:

Operational & Strategic Marketing Leadership
• Ensure the seamless execution of marketing and brand activities and take a leadership role in managing marketing and PR operations, reporting on updates, results and required optimizations to the Management Team as needed.
• Collaborate with the Marcoms team to inform, implement, and execute strategic initiatives and maintain a marketing and event calendar.
• Current Head of Marketing & PR will be on maternity leave from May 2024 – Jan 2025. Take on leadership role in absence of Head of Marketing and PR. Upon return, manage the execution operations of the Marcoms team and provide data-driven insights to inform strategy in conjunction with Head of Marketing and PR.

Growth through Lead Generation & Nurturing
• Partner with the Chief Growth Officer and front-line teams to identify and engage target groups through data-driven, multi-channel inbound campaigns, communicating customer-centric value propositions of Puro.earth, converting interest into tangible leads and customers. Channels include SEO, SEM and paid social media.
• Lead nurturing initiatives, including crafting compelling emails and other content to engage potential clients.
• Must have experience in HubSpot CRM.
• Manage and optimize lead automation workflows within Hubspot.
• Utilize data and analytics to optimize digital marketing performance, including AB testing.
• Collaborate with frontline staff to review and improve the quality of MQLs and SQLs coming through the pipeline.

Event Marketing
• Take charge of planning and organizing sponsored and Puro.earth-hosted events, webinars, and promotions in conjunction with Regional Operations Heads of NAMAR, EMEA, and APAC.
• Ensure event lead generation tracking is in place in Hubspot to inform ROI.

Content Development & Sales Collateral:
• Implement corporate thought leadership messaging and positioning within content and oversee the creation of high-quality and engaging content across various platforms, including the blog, case studies, and reports.
• Provide sales support by improving sales collateral (brochures/PPT decks) to create compelling, visually enticing narratives.

Performance Metrics and Reporting:
• Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) for marketing initiatives.
• Provide regular reports on marketing performance, with insights and recommendations for improvement, while managing reporting dashboards in Hubspot.

Collaboration with External Partners:
• Identify, onboard, and manage external marketing partners and agencies to support content creation and other needs as per the Marketing budget. These include, but are not limited to, design agencies, digital marketing agencies and photo and video vendors.
• Ensure timely delivery and quality output from external collaborations.
• Optimize the impact of sales channel partnerships through the development and execution of collaborative campaigns that mutually enhance the value of both parties involved.

Website
• Oversee the maintenance and content updates of the Puro.earth website.
• Work with the Tech team and Innovations and Continuous Improvement team to ensure new customer-centric features and functionalities are implemented as defined by Head of Marketing and PR and other business owners.

PR Communications Oversight
• Support in overseeing PR activities and communication strategies in collaboration with the Head of Communications and ensure a consistent brand image within all our communications.

Qualifications:
• Proven experience in senior-level marketing and PR roles.
• Strong leadership and strategic planning skills.
• Excellent organizational and communication abilities.
• Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and with external partners.
• Strong (near) native English written and verbal communications skills •
• B2B Marketing background, ideally with carbon/climate/ESG related marketing experience preferred
• Experience with Marketing automation (HubSpot)
• Experience setting up and running paid advertisements in LinkedIn and Google Ads
• A pragmatist with a positive, can-do attitude
• Ability to function effectively in a fast-paced environment with a bias towards action in situations characterized by ambiguity
• Passionate about sustainability and growing a developing engineered carbon market
